original_text: And as the sailors were seeking to escape from the ship, and had lowered the ship's boat into the sea under pretense of laying out anchors from the bow,
korean_text: 사공들이 도망하고자 하여 이물에서 닻을 내리는 체하고 거룻배를 바다에 내려 놓거늘

sentences.original_text: And as the sailors were seeking to escape from the ship,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 선원들이 배에서 탈출하려고 할 때,

sentences.original_text: and had lowered the ship's boat into the sea
under pretense of laying out anchors from the bow,
